idea-plugin.name: Butterknife Removal Tool
idea-plugin.description:
Automatically removes Butterknife annotations from Android projects and converts them to standard findViewById calls.

Features:

  • Converts @BindView annotations to findViewById() calls
  • Converts @OnClick annotations to setOnClickListener() calls
  • Removes Butterknife imports and bind calls
  • Process entire project or individual files
  • Maintains code formatting and structure

Usage:

Right-click on any Java file or package in your Android project and select "Remove Butterknife" from the context menu.

  • Added support for multiple resource IDs in @OnClick annotations
  • Added "Remove Butterknife" action to Refactor menu
  • Improved method parameter handling for onClick methods
  • Updated IDE compatibility to support newer versions

Version 1.0.0

  • Initial release
  • Support for @BindView and @OnClick conversion
  • File and directory processing options
